name: Introduction to Python Programming
description: Learn the basics of Python programming, including syntax, data structures, and simple algorithms.

name: Web Development with JavaScript
description: Explore the fundamentals of JavaScript and build interactive web applications.

name: Data Science with Python
description: Dive into data science techniques using Python, including data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.

name: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Understand the basics of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning techniques.

name: Frontend Development with React
description: Master frontend development with React, building modern and responsive web applications.

name: Database Management with SQL
description: Learn to manage databases using SQL, with a focus on data retrieval, updates, and database design.
